paddlenlp 2.2.3
paddlepaddle-gpu 2.21.post110
paddle-serving  0.7.0

使用的模型
https://bj.bcebos.com/v1/paddlenlp/models/inbatch_model.zip

in_batch_negative 项目中,使用 export_to_serving.py 导出将来在 paddle serving 所使用的模型，成功
然后,使用 deploy/python/web_service.py 来启动加载模型.

但  deploy/python/predict.py 直接访问 inference.get_pooled_embedding.pdiparams,能获得句子向量,速度就非常快. (用 export_model.py 导出的模型)

title: 【内存问题】GPT/Bert模型初始化后无法释放CPU内存
body:
环境最新的PaddleNLP 代码。

```python
from paddlenlp.transformers import BertModel
import paddle
import psutil
import time
import gc


div_gb_factor =(1024.0 ** 3)
paddle.set_device("cpu")
print("before construct..")
pc_mem =psutil.virtual_memory()
print("usedmemory: %GGB" % float(pc_mem.used/div_gb_factor))

model = BertModel(50304)
# print(model.parameters())
time.sleep(5)
pc_mem =psutil.virtual_memory()
print("after construct..")
print("usedmemory: %GGB" % float(pc_mem.used/div_gb_factor))

del model
gc.collect()
gc.collect()
gc.collect()
gc.collect()
gc.collect()
gc.collect()

time.sleep(20)
print("Release..")
pc_mem =psutil.virtual_memory()
print("usedmemory: %GGB" % float(pc_mem.used/div_gb_factor))
#time.sleep(100)
```

在cpu上声明了bert模型后，在调用del，无法释放内存。这里初步调查原因是由于``BertModel``继承了``BertPretrainedModel``导致的，如果继承``nn.Layer``那么就可以释放。怀疑存在引用计数无法释放的问题。

title: Albert推理稳定性问题
body:
PaddleNLP 2.2.3，PaddlePaddle-gpu 2.2.1
Python 3.8.11 Linux

发现在使用过程中，不同的batch_size得到的结果截然不同的，
我尝试输出了一下pooled_output，发现batch_size分别为32和64的，总共长度为128的数据集，在L33出现了diff，

```python
import paddle
from paddlenlp.transformers import AlbertTokenizer
from paddlenlp.transformers import AlbertModel
from paddlenlp.data import Pad
paddle.set_device("gpu")
model = AlbertModel.from_pretrained('albert-chinese-small')
tokenizer = AlbertTokenizer.from_pretrained('albert-chinese-small')
model.eval()

batchify_fn = lambda samples, fn=Pad(
    axis=0,
    pad_val=tokenizer.pad_token_id,
): fn(samples)

raw_inputs = [f"Paddle{i}好用的不得了" for i in range(128)]
batch_size = 32 #调整这里的batch_size

encode_inputs = [
    tokenizer(text=raw_input, max_seq_len=128)
    for raw_input in raw_inputs
]
encode_input_ids = [
    encode_input['input_ids']
    for encode_input in encode_inputs
]
batches = [
    encode_input_ids[idx:idx + batch_size]
    for idx in range(0, len(encode_input_ids), batch_size)
]
batchify_fn = lambda samples, fn=Pad(
    axis=0,
    pad_val=tokenizer.pad_token_id,
): fn(samples)
pool_ = []
for batch in batches:
    input_ids = paddle.to_tensor(batchify_fn(batch))
    _sequence_output, pooled_output = model(input_ids=input_ids)
    pool_.extend(pooled_output.tolist())
for vec in pool_:
    print(vec)
```

title: 使用pretrained model預測值每個session都不同
body:
你好，我想請教關於模型預測的問題。

我用照著PaddlePaddle官方教程 [『NLP经典项目集』02：使用预训练模型ERNIE优化情感分析](https://aistudio.baidu.com/aistudio/projectdetail/1294333)去試著使用預訓練模型進行預測發生了不同session預測的值都不一樣的狀況。

以下是我用來load model的code，裏面也是節錄自教程。
```py
MODEL_NAME = "ernie-tiny"
model = paddlenlp.transformers.ErnieForSequenceClassification.from_pretrained(
    MODEL_NAME, num_classes=2
)
tokenizer = paddlenlp.transformers.ErnieTokenizer.from_pretrained(MODEL_NAME)
```

下面兩個session是我測出來的兩次結果。

- Session 1
  
  ```py

  Label: negative  Data: 作为老的四星酒店，房间依然很整洁，相当不错。机场接机服务很好，可以在车上办理入住手续，节省时间。
  ```

- Session 2

title: ernie-doc imdb数据集 复现问题
body:
python3.7，paddlepaddle2.1.1，运行命令是python3.7 examples/language_model/ernie-doc/run_classifier.py --batch_size 8 --model_name_or_path ernie-doc-base-en
里面的参数没改，我看默认是imdb数据集，训练过程中，acc先上升到了0.7+，但是后来一直下降，请问有人碰到这种问题吗？

title: FT support context forward acceleration
body:
<!-- Demo: https://github.com/PaddlePaddle/PaddleNLP/pull/26 -->
### PR types
<!-- One of [ New features | Bug fixes | Function optimization | Performance optimization | Breaking changes | Others ] -->
Performance optimization

### PR changes
<!-- One of [ Models | APIs | Docs | Others ] -->
Models & APIs

### Description
<!-- Describe what this PR does -->
FT support context forward acceleration. 

DONE:
* Main function `forward_context()` based on `beam_search(v1/v2/v3)` strategy complete. 
  * Post-/Pre-normalization supports. 
  * UnifiedTransformer Embedding supports. 
  * Altering left padding cache to right padding. 
* Update custom op and support accepting `context`, `attn_mask` and `token_id`. 
* Update UnifiedTransformer python API. 
* Verify UnifiedTransformer accuracy. 
* Main function `forward_context()` based on `(topk-/topp-)sampling` strategy. 
* Make activation alternative, only GELU is supported before. 
* Update UnimoText python API. 
* Verify UnimoText accuracy. (Verify post-normalization. )
* Adjust `PLATO` embedding which needs role embedding.
* Support custom position ids in FT.

TODO:
* Dy2sta.

title: fix the ips of Bert in the static graph
body:
<!-- Demo: https://github.com/PaddlePaddle/PaddleNLP/pull/26 -->
### PR types
<!-- One of [ New features | Bug fixes | Function optimization | Performance optimization | Breaking changes | Others ] -->
Bug fixes

### PR changes
<!-- One of [ Models | APIs | Docs | Others ] -->
Models

### Description
<!-- Describe what this PR does -->
There are two main problems for the error in the ips results of Bert:
- when static bert is trained by many cards, Each card will read a complete HDF5 file and it is not the same, but the `create_pretraining_dataset` is sharding again, causing some data to miss reading.
- There are problems with the ips calculation formula, the `total_samples` is where each `train_data_loader` is reset to 0, global_step is not. When `global_steps % args.logging_steps == 0`, the `total_samples` may not be the same each time.So the total time is the sum of reader and trainer, and I think the correct formula is `args.batch_size / (reader_cost_avg.get_average() + train_cost_avg.get_average())`  

After testing, the order of magnitude of ips is consistent with Bert of different framework, please review for confirmation.

title: Unified customization for Taskflow
body:
<!-- Demo: https://github.com/PaddlePaddle/PaddleNLP/pull/26 -->
### PR types
<!-- One of [ New features | Bug fixes | Function optimization | Performance optimization | Breaking changes | Others ] -->
Function optimization
### PR changes
<!-- One of [ Models | APIs | Docs | Others ] -->
Others
### Description
<!-- Describe what this PR does -->
1. Taskflow自定义任务统一设计

用法示例：

```python
from paddlenlp import Taskflow

my_lac = Taskflow("lexical_analysis", task_path="./custom_task_path/")
```

2. WordTag任务支持通过用户干预词典对分词结果进行后处理，适配自定义TermTree及自定义Term-Linking

https://github.com/PaddlePaddle/PaddleNLP/issues/1514 对应任务定制化示例如下：

Step1：定义词典文件`user_dict.txt`

```text
静磁场/物理术语
```

Step2：指定自定义TermTree

通过`task_path`指定用户自定义路径，文件组成：
```text
custom_task_path/
├── termtree_type.csv
└── termtree_data
```

Step3：Taskflow装载用户字典及自定义TermTree
```python
from paddlenlp import Taskflow
wordtag = Taskflow(
    "knowledge_mining", 
    task_path="./custom_task",
    user_dict="./user_dict.txt")

# [{'text': '静磁场中的磁场能与电场能。', 'items': [{'item': '静磁场', 'offset': 0, 'wordtag_label': '物理术语', 'length': 3, 'termid': '物理术语_cb_静磁场'}, {'item': '中', 'offset': 3, 'wordtag_label': '词汇用语', 'length': 1}, {'item': '的', 'offset': 4, 'wordtag_label': '助词', 'length': 1, 'termid': '助词_cb_的'}, {'item': '磁场', 'offset': 5, 'wordtag_label': '术语类', 'length': 2, 'termid': '物理术语_cb_磁场'}, {'item': '能', 'offset': 7, 'wordtag_label': '肯定词', 'length': 1, 'termid': '肯定否定词_cb_能'}, {'item': '与', 'offset': 8, 'wordtag_label': '介词', 'length': 1, 'termid': '介词_cb_与'}, {'item': '电场', 'offset': 9, 'wordtag_label': '术语类', 'length': 2, 'termid': '物理术语_cb_电场'}, {'item': '能', 'offset': 11, 'wordtag_label': '肯定词', 'length': 1, 'termid': '肯定否定词_cb_能'}, {'item': '。', 'offset': 12, 'wordtag_label': 'w', 'length': 1}]}]
```

```
import paddle
```

title: PaddleNLP 2.2.3 Release Note Candidate
body:
# New Features

## ERNIE-M #1510

* 新增跨语言预训练模型ERNIE-M，包含基于ERNIE-M的自然语言推理任务示例。

## XNLI Dataset  #1474

* 新增XNLI文本蕴含数据集。

## Tokenizer upgrade #1496 

* Tokenizer新增支持传入自定义special token的功能和正确分词文本中special token的功能。

# Bugfix

* 修复 `import paddlenlp` 报 `No module named 'packaging'` 的错误。#1536
* 修复 FasterTransformer 导出 float16 预测模型失败的错误。#1539
* 修复BERT模型在SQUAD任务运行失败的错误。  #1522 
* 修复首次使用nltk包运行失败的错误。 #1515 
* 修复dataset.map多线程数据处理时会报错的问题。#1511
* 修复Albert模型的tokenizer出现pad_token_id和词表不一致的错误。#1535
